block.p: National Basketball Association ATLANTA HAWKS--Waived F Stephen Howard, F Rich Hughes and G Dan Cross. DETROIT PISTONS--Released G David Vanterpool and F Antonio Smith. PHILADELPHIA 76ERS--Signed G Vernon Maxwell.

National Football League NFL--Fined Cleveland DE Courtney Brown $7,500 for hitting Pittsburgh QB Kordell Stewart in the rib cage with his helmet in last week's game. JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS--Waived S Craig Miller. Signed DE Michael Mason from the practice squad.

National Basketball Association ATLANTA HAWKS--Waived F Stephen Howard, F Rich Hughes and G Dan Cross. DETROIT PISTONS--Released G David Vanterpool and F Antonio Smith. PHILADELPHIA 76ERS--Signed G Vernon Maxwell.

National Football League NFL--Fined Cleveland DE Courtney Brown $7,500 for hitting Pittsburgh QB Kordell Stewart in the rib cage with his helmet in last week's game. JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS--Waived S Craig Miller. Signed DE Michael Mason from the practice squad.
